channel.description: Recent content in bj on LS | Papermod

item.title: Fun and Games in the Pedo Ring
item.description: This is story 30 in the Ring series. Sean (35) was the original character, living with a useless single Mum, Michelle, his whole purpose being the complete sexual molesting of her attractive daughter, Hannah. Since then, others have got involved, the earliest being 32yo Dan, her gentle schoolteacher, and the not-so-gentle 37yo Simon. This story follows on directly from 'Group-night with 10-year-old Hannah'(12th Nov).

item.title: Little Slave Girl Hannah
item.description: This is story 20 in the Pedophile Ring series. 9yo Hannah yesterday came back from her holiday with her 32yo schoolteacher/abuser, Dan. Sean and his hard-edged pedo buddy, Simon, used that time for a quick abduction and rape of 'fresh' 10yo Abigail, stepgranddaughter of Bill (the 3rd of Hannah's abusers). Today, all 4 men are round at Sean's for 'an evening of Hannah'.

item.title: The Rape Of Abigail
item.description: This is part 18 in the Pedophile Ring series. 9yo Hannah is taking a break from the story for a while, as she has been taken on holiday by her schoolteacher/abuser, Dan. Here Sean and his hard-edged pedo buddy, Simon, are carrying out their planned abduction and rape of Abigail, stepgranddaughter of Bill (the 3rd of Hannah's abusers). They have her in a clearing, in the woods, having already forced her to strip and subjected her to fondling and kissing and cowed her by threats, which was not difficult.
